message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth considering a price of $1200000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid $1100000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1250000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm not going to go below $1150000, so let's meet in the middle at $1175000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1160000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm thinking of $1180000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle one last time.
I understand you're trying to get a fair price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1160000 for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher, so this is my final offer.

I'm disappointed that we couldn't meet at a mutually agreeable price, but I'm not willing to sell the product for less than $1200000. I'm willing to make one last attempt to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $1190000. This is my final offer.
